title: UWP Grid should have ShowGridLines property from WPF
body: The WPF Grid control had a ShowGridLines property.  This is helpful for layout debugging.  This property is missing in UWP.

comments.body: Xaml controls have been open sourced, and the best place to propose changes is now on our https://github.com/Microsoft/microsoft-ui-xaml repo. In fact, there's a Grid feature proposal (https://github.com/Microsoft/microsoft-ui-xaml/issues/54) that should include this request.
